changes.description: Updated color palette with modern blue primary (217 91% 60%), light gray-blue secondary (210 40% 96%), cyan/teal accent (199 89% 48%); added CSS shadow variables; added 8px-based spacing scale; improved typography with Inter font, antialiasing, and letter-spacing
Increased title to text-2xl with tighter tracking; added optional subtitle prop; increased horizontal padding to px-8; added subtle shadow; enhanced refresh button with improved hover states

Added shadow for depth; redesigned logo section with branded icon container; added navigation section header; changed border-radius to rounded-lg; increased icon size to h-5; added footer section with app info
